All vignettes can be found as articles on the website [https://alexpate30.github.io/calibmsm/index.html](https://alexpate30.github.io/calibmsm/index.html).

The [Overview](https://alexpate30.github.io/calibmsm/articles/Overview.html) vignette is a guide on how to use the package by running through a clinical example. This should be used as the starting point for understanding how to use **calibmsm**. This vignette will be submitted for publication when it is ready and a reference will be added here.

The [BLR-IPCW-manual-bootstrap](https://alexpate30.github.io/calibmsm/articles/BLR-IPCW-manual-bootstrap.html) vignette showcases how to estimate a confidence interval manually using bootstrapping, and how to manually specify a function for estimating the inverse probability of censoring weights.

The [Calibration-curves-estimated-with-loess-smoothers](https://alexpate30.github.io/calibmsm/articles/Calibration-curves-estimated-with-loess-smoothers.html) vignette repeats the analyses from the [Overview](https://alexpate30.github.io/calibmsm/articles/Overview.html) vignette using loess smoothers to estimate the calibration curves instead of restricted cubic splines.
